Episodes.Title: Pistachio / Full Team Ahead
Episodes.Plot: Barney cannot stop eating pistachios; BJ looks for players for his baseball team.

Episodes.Title: The Magic Words / Litterbot
Episodes.Plot: Baby Bop forgets to say "please" and "thank you"; Riff invents something to pick up litter.

Episodes.Title: Bop 'til You Drop / The Sleepless Sleepover
Episodes.Plot: Baby Bop becomes a little bossy while playing with others; Melanie is nervous about an overnight camp-out in the park.

Episodes.Title: Little Red Rockin' Hood / The Whole Truth
Episodes.Plot: Barney and the little dinos tell the story of "Little Red Riding Hood" by singing it; BJ is mistaken for an artist.

Episodes.Title: The Wind and the Sun  / The Nature of Things
Episodes.Plot: Baby Bop and BJ fight over the same spot; Rachel learns the importance of nature and keeping Earth clean.
